example.text: Prioritizing illegal immigrants over veterans who served our nation in uniform is downright disgraceful. We have a long way to go help our homeless veterans get back on their feet – this takes us in the opposite direction. [[url]]

April 30, 2023 Website 16th District About Vern News Services Resources Legislation Contact This week, the US House passed legislation to raise the debt ceiling while also cutting spending by $4.8 trillion over the next 10 years. Do you think it's time for President Biden to come to the table and negotiate with Republicans on a deal to raise the nation's borrowing limit?

The slaughter of horses for consumption is a barbaric practice that has no place in America. Pleased to be leading the effort with [[user]] again to ban domestic horse slaughter and protect these majestic creatures. [[url]]

Prioritizing illegal immigrants over veterans who served our nation in uniform is downright disgraceful. We have a long way to go help our homeless veterans get back on their feet – this takes us in the opposite direction. [[url]]

The overwhelming majority of performing artists are working-class Americans trying to support their families. In an op-ed for [[user]], [[user]] and I discuss our legislation to give tax parity to low and middle-income performers. [[url]]
